title: What do you think is the most annoying skin?
body:
For me its galaxy rumble
~~is this even the right board for this?~~

replies.body:
If folks have skins that stand out as being super loud when compared to base and it's annoying, let me know and I'll look into getting the levels better - it's super relevant to some of the BTS audio stuff we've been doing lately!

Edit - Specifically audio stuff is the stuff I can/ will be changing
Could you take a look at pool party Draven? The Q hit sound and catch sound seem way too loud.

> [{quoted}](name=ShinyJumanjiMan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=00090003,timestamp=2017-07-24T22:14:05.734+0000)
>
> Could you take a look at pool party Draven? The Q hit sound and catch sound seem way too loud.

I actually did a pass on all Draven skins that'll be coming out with all the Omega Squad skins this upcoming patch! Pool Party Draven was actually a huge offender of being way too loud. If you have a chance to play against or as one next week, he should be more in line with all the other Draven skins, and Draven as a champion will be as loud as other ADCs, instead of louder.
so his ego is being nerfed?
Alistar's annoying skin. Could you please make that bell quieter?

> [{quoted}](name=Illâoi,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=00090006,timestamp=2017-07-24T23:18:00.643+0000)
>
> Alistar's annoying skin. Could you please make that bell quieter?

Did this last patch! Should be more in line with other emote volumes and less tilting

explain to me, why 3 games in a row i have played agiest challengers and diamonds, with plats and silvers on my team. its not fair, its not balanced.

if you cant garentee a fair game, the challengers need to wait longer or break up there premade. i have played 3 games in a row and lost all of them, how many games should i lose over and over becasue you can fix match making. or do you think a plat 5 should be playing agiest challengers?
I think you're in the wrong place to talk about matchmaking.

Can you take a peek at Eve W (base and skins).
Getting marked by it makes it extremely hard to hear other important game sounds going on.

Edit: below is a post with a good summary and video about it.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/wr5ZxKes-evelynn-w-sounds

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=00090012,timestamp=2018-01-21T04:38:30.083+0000)
>
> Can you take a peek at Eve W (base and skins).
> Getting marked by it makes it extremely hard to hear other important game sounds going on.
> 
> Edit: below is a post with a good summary and video about it.
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/wr5ZxKes-evelynn-w-sounds

I'll talk to the sound designer that worked on her - I know this was an intentional choice to duck out other sounds when she uses this spell, but not being able to use sound for playing the game for those 1.5 seconds is super important, so I'll see if I can't get him to back the effect down!
Please make the Rogue Blitzcrank skin Q louder, it has almost no noise or animation, i know you don't do animation but a little more sound would be nice. thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=You Suck At Help,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0009000c,timestamp=2018-01-07T10:21:37.789+0000)
>
> Please make the Rogue Blitzcrank skin Q louder, it has almost no noise or animation, i know you don't do animation but a little more sound would be nice. thanks!

I can send this feedback over to the designer that made the sounds for this skin! Thank you :D
Honestly, super galaxy rumble is the only one i've ever noticed. And its only because its cringey as fuck hearing "galaxy flamespitter" and "mega ultra shield".

I'm not sure if this is a bug or not (since i've reported it in the past and it didn't get fixed) but damn Illaoi's Tentacles SFX when she dances are so annoying. Thing is their SFX doesn't stop when Illaoi stops dancing. This actually made me stop dancing at all. Is it a bug or is it intended?

> [{quoted}](name=AnataBakka,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0009000d,timestamp=2018-01-07T23:04:07.709+0000)
>
> I'm not sure if this is a bug or not (since i've reported it in the past and it didn't get fixed) but damn Illaoi's Tentacles SFX when she dances are so annoying. Thing is their SFX doesn't stop when Illaoi stops dancing. This actually made me stop dancing at all. Is it a bug or is it intended?

I can take a look, it should be stopping if the dance isn't happening anymore
thx... a... lllot. Here's some help https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JySrMChlr1E

> [{quoted}](name=AnataBakka,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0009000d00000000,timestamp=2018-01-09T12:48:06.666+0000)
>
> thx... a... lllot. Here's some help https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JySrMChlr1E

Thanks for the video, this made it super clear. Just got it all fixed up! Should be out in patch 8.3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Was just in a game with a reksai on the team, I believe the sound was coming from him. This strong, loud humming sound effect actually gave me a headache. Couldn't stand it less than 5 mins into the game and had to turn down the fx. Since I wasn't looking at the loading screen, I'm not sure what skin or if it was the original. Though I could be wrong entirely and it wasn't coming from that champion.

> [{quoted}](name=o0Rhein0o,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0009000a,timestamp=2018-01-05T00:03:00.358+0000)
>
> Was just in a game with a reksai on the team, I believe the sound was coming from him. This strong, loud humming sound effect actually gave me a headache. Couldn't stand it less than 5 mins into the game and had to turn down the fx. Since I wasn't looking at the loading screen, I'm not sure what skin or if it was the original. Though I could be wrong entirely and it wasn't coming from that champion.

I know the exact sound you're talking about - I think it's part of the tremor sense Passive when she's burrowed! I just did a pass on Rek'Sai's volumes overall and that should be out in Patch 8.2, so keep your ears open for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0009000a0000,timestamp=2018-01-05T01:38:37.207+0000)
>
> I know the exact sound you're talking about - I think it's part of the tremor sense Passive when she's burrowed! I just did a pass on Rek'Sai's volumes overall and that should be out in Patch 8.2, so keep your ears open for it.

Thank you for being attentive and responsive to issues.

It means a lot to me, and shows you care about the game.
Iron legion Garen is really annoying when he spins.  His spin is about all I can hear when it is going.

> [{quoted}](name=AlienPrimate,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=00090008,timestamp=2017-07-25T01:11:27.250+0000)
>
> Iron legion Garen is really annoying when he spins.  His spin is about all I can hear when it is going.

This will be the same level as base Garen this upcoming patch 7.15!

Man, I wish you guys would add back the line you removed years ago when Garen spins. You know the [one](https://youtu.be/2XNr8xY9xWU?t=104). The one where he sounds like a spinning screaming drunk caveman. I chuckled every time I heard it.

How about Riot Kayle ;.;

Pretty please take a peek at her E sound levels.
That damn Final Boss Malzahar and his minion spawning sound is the most obnoxious thing in the entire game.  If y'all could fix it I'd die a happy man.

> [{quoted}](name=QMighty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=00090010,timestamp=2018-01-09T05:09:17.448+0000)
>
> That damn Final Boss Malzahar and his minion spawning sound is the most obnoxious thing in the entire game.  If y'all could fix it I'd die a happy man.

Wow good timing with this - We actually have a designer actively on it! Not sure what patch it's meant for but I know it's relatively soon 8.2 or 8.3. Keep an eye on the patch notes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0vhfEgQVDAc
ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha
Star Guardian Jinx. The aoto of Popw pow are just too damn annoying and she uses it constantly.

> [{quoted}](name=PTZekrom69,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2017-07-24T22:33:41.248+0000)
>
> Star Guardian Jinx. The aoto of Popw pow are just too damn annoying and she uses it constantly.

SG Jinx is actually one of the skins I've leveled out locally - it should be more in line with the rest of Jinx skins when the fix goes live in 7.16! Some of the annoyance from that skin could just straight up be the sounds themself though, since they are all pitchy and synthy. Soooo yeah I made those so direct your hate this way I guess. I know for a fact some SFX on her were just too loud.

Did audio for other Jinx skins get changed as well?

When I bought Slayer Jinx at release it was because she had a very satisfying "Vroom" rusty chainsaw sound when switching guns.

I tried playing her again (probably hadn't played her in over a year) and the gun switching sound was barerly audible, much lower than I remember, to a degre that I had a hard time seeing me noticing it at all and much less buying it because of the sound.
Aetherwing Kayle's Swooshes seem pretty loud..

> [{quoted}](name=Kayah,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2017-07-25T00:21:58.969+0000)
>
> Aetherwing Kayle's Swooshes seem pretty loud..

Sounds like this is a common one. I'll make sure this one gets looked at. Thanks for the heads up!
Moocow Alistar. His cowbell is still ringing in my ears.

Bunny Fizz

I hate him so much...

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-07-24T22:14:01.727+0000)
>
> Bunny Fizz
> 
> I hate him so much...

Damn son that was my first skin. What's the deal with him? Anything SFX wise that is too loud or you just hate him?

Do not need to worry about that, it's mostly about my personal taste as I can't really meld his model into the field and just stands too much out.

Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol attack sound is much more of an issue though (as I wrote in the other comment xD). Try to interrupt his attack and it really feels like screeching metal.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2017-07-24T22:31:45.572+0000)
>
> Do not need to worry about that, it's mostly about my personal taste as I can't really meld his model into the field and just stands too much out.
> 
> Ashen Lord Aurelion Sol attack sound is much more of an issue though (as I wrote in the other comment xD). Try to interrupt his attack and it really feels like screeching metal.

Okay ty for the clarification! I actually turned down his AA this past patch a bit, so it should be a bit less irritating and feel more like Base Aurelion does :D
Thank you, I'll test it soon then and let you know if things got better ^^
Every lux skin
Even Commando? That is the best skin in the _game_, baby!
HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA {{champion:20}}  (You know what skin I'm talking about)
the best skin ever?
Demon blade trynd tilts me just because of that passive noise. Its too damn loud and frequent

> [{quoted}](name=Icysombrero,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-07-24T17:15:58.720+0000)
>
> Demon blade trynd tilts me just because of that passive noise. Its too damn loud and frequent

I'll look into this and bring it down to the levels of his passive SFX on all his other skins!

Yasuo's most recent skin did something amazing.

It turned his Q and E sounds down to an obscene level. To the point it is like "hi, my third Q is here and I am dashing". That and the sound effects themselves are not infuriating to hear.

Every other skin (blood moon, hi noon, base and project) are more like "HERE I AM LOOK AT ME I HAVE 3 Q STACKS DON'T STOP LOOKING AT ME! SEE NOW I AM USING E! HAHA EVEN IF YOU STOP LOOKING YOU CAN STILL HEAR MEEEEEE!"

I feel his obnoxious sounds, his ability to spam them and the volume are part of what players dislike about him.

Volume is one thing you can control, so perhaps turning him down for enemies a lil would be better across all of his skins excluding his new one. I mean I already get a big ass visual indication of 3 q stacks

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2017-07-24T23:11:57.028+0000)
>
> Yasuo's most recent skin did something amazing.
> 
> It turned his Q and E sounds down to an obscene level. To the point it is like "hi, my third Q is here and I am dashing". That and the sound effects themselves are not infuriating to hear.
> 
> Every other skin (blood moon, hi noon, base and project) are more like "HERE I AM LOOK AT ME I HAVE 3 Q STACKS DON'T STOP LOOKING AT ME! SEE NOW I AM USING E! HAHA EVEN IF YOU STOP LOOKING YOU CAN STILL HEAR MEEEEEE!"
> 
> I feel his obnoxious sounds, his ability to spam them and the volume are part of what players dislike about him.
> 
> Volume is one thing you can control, so perhaps turning him down for enemies a lil would be better. I mean I already get a big ass visual indication of 3 q stacks

That skin sounds totally badass in my opinion. I thought it did an awesome job of hitting all the gameplay stuff that's critical to Yas players, without being too heavy so that it buries everything around it. 

One thing you touched on was bringing SFX down for enemies - One thing I think would help clear up gameplay is if we could mix your champ just a little bit louder than everyone else so you get more information for the champ you are playing.
Lunar Wraith Caitlyn has to be one of the loudest and most obnoxious skins ive ever seen

> [{quoted}](name=Dunkin Darius,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ctK4L2wc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-24T06:43:45.654+0000)
>
> Lunar Wraith Caitlyn has to be one of the loudest and most obnoxious skins ive ever seen

I actually just turned this skins down and got her SFX in a place where they are balanced with the levels of all her other skins about 2 patches ago! The comb filtering thing on her Q where it would play the same sound a bunch is no longer an issue either.
